title: Strawberry Ice Cream
subtitle: Cookinstructions
maintext: Cut the pineapple into small pieces and freeze them. Mix the frozen pineapple with the coconut milk and the rum. Put the mixture in the freezer for 2 hours. Stir the mixture every 30 minutes.
description: 🍓🍌 Homemade Strawberry Ice Cream! 🍦✨Experience the magic of turning frozen strawberries and ripe bananas into a velvety treat that's as luscious as it is nutritious. With just a touch of almond milk, this homemade delight boasts the flavors of summer in a delicious package. 🌞🌱 Say goodbye to store-bought ice creams laden with additives and hello to a simple, real-ingredient indulgence. Dive into a bowl of goodness that's perfect for hot days and sweet cravings.
